name: A Bear Trouble Adventure - The Mission is through the forest to get home
name_original: A Bear Trouble Adventure - The Mission is through the forest to get home
description:
The Bear is after the honey and the angry Honeybees are after the bear because of him stealing their precious Honey. Help the bear reach his cave safe.

Swipe Up to Jump. Swipe Down to Run down. Collect stars to score high.
